description: When squared gives number composed of digits {1,2,3}.
links: P. De Geest, Squares containing at most three distinct digits, Index entries for related sequences
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Square Number.
mathematica: Do[ If[ Union[ Join[{1, 2, 3}, IntegerDigits[n^2] ] ] == {1, 2, 3}, Print[n] ], {n, 0, 10^9}]
author: _Patrick De Geest_
extensions: More terms from _Patrick De Geest_, Mar 01 2000.
More terms from C. Ronaldo (aga_new_ac(AT)hotmail.com), Jan 14 2005
